It's not about looks. If it functions, do that

For you, (clearly) not for everyone.

To the OP:

Tidus Klein's suggestion of an upside-down fairing is one good idea. Some people without that mod use structural panels in a ring instead, but you probably don't want to go that route unless you insist on remaining "stock."
